File List
Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
background.hBackground control functions
border.hHeader file for border functions
button.hHeader file for button functions
client.hHeader file for client window functions
clientlist.hFunctions to manage lists of clients
clock.hClock tray component
color.hHeader for the color functions
command.hHandle running startup, shutdown, and restart commands
confirm.hHeader for the confirm dialog functions
cursor.hHeader for the cursor functions
debug.hHeader for the debug functions
desktop.hHeader for the desktop management functions
dock.hDock tray component (used for system notifications)
error.hHeader for the error functions
event.hHeader for the event functions
font.hHeader for the font functions
grab.hHeader file for managing server grabs
gradient.hGradient fill functions
group.hFunctions for handling window groups
help.hHeader for the help functions
hint.hHeader for reading and writing X properties
icon.hHeader file for icon functions
image.hFunctions to load images
jwm.hThe main JWM header file
jxlib.hMacros to wrap X calls for debugging
key.hHeader for the key binding functions
lex.hXML lexer header file
main.hHeader for the main functions
match.hExpression matching
menu.hHeader for the menu functions
misc.hMiscellaneous functions and macros
move.hHeader for client window move functions
outline.hOutlines for moving and resizing client windows
pager.hPager tray component
parse.hHeader file for the JWM configuration parser
place.hHeader for client placement functions
popup.hHeader for popup functions
render.hFunctions to render icons using the XRender extension
resize.hHeader for client window resize functions
root.hHeader for the root menu functions
screen.hHeader for screen functions
settings.hJWM settings
spacer.hSpacer tray component
status.hHeader for the status functions
swallow.hSwallow tray component
taskbar.hTask list tray component
timing.hTiming functions
tray.hHeader for the tray functions
traybutton.hButton tray component
winmenu.hHeader for the window menu functions
